credit_line: Gift of George W. George, Class of 1941
title: Leaders of Israel
inscriptions: l.l. in ink: RUBE GOLDBERG/ IN ISRAEL; l.r. typed on sheet: THE OUTSTANDING LEADERS OF ISRAEL, BEN-GURION, SHARRETT,/ AND BEN ZVI, LIKE EVERYTHING IN THIS COUNTRY OF CONTRASTS,/ ARE STRIKINGLY DIFFERENT IN PERSONALITY AND APPEARANCE.; verso l.l. in pencil: 63[encircled]
